name: Godslayer Be God
simple_desc:
Consumes Charge. Deals massive Imaginary DMG to one designated enemy and massive Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets.
This ability will be automatically used.
desc:
Consumes #3[i] point(s) of Charge. Deals Imaginary DMG equal to #1[i]% of Mydei's Max HP to one enemy and Imaginary DMG equal to #2[i]% of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets.
This ability will be automatically used. While this ability is in use, Charge cannot be accumulated.
